info.brief_description: Simple: a setting where everyone is a futa and everything is sexual!
info.description:
In this setting, every character is a futa woman, and all aspects of their lives are sexualized/hyper sexualized! This setting is very fetish-rich, as one might imagine, and thus a LOT can get tangled up in the story! The concept is simple, but there are a few rules:

No males (obviously)

If you'd like to add a fetish that is "out there" or otherwise not very common, make it an option at the end of a consistent chapter, rather than "taking over: an already existing chapter line. An example of this would be, say, body growth.

The story is obviously unrealistic, and it can be AS unrealistic as you want it to be when making a chapter. Although, some people may not like it as unrealistic or realistic as you, so, as with "out there" fetishes, make certain things options at the end of chapters, instead of taking over a chapter. An example of this would be introducing a character with an excessively large dick (say, 30 inches or so) and other similar things.

Other than adhering to these, go nuts! Be creative as you want and have fun! Any additions are welcome!
